name: DreamCricket.com
overview:
http://www.dreamcricket.com is the largest Cricket Community in the USA. http://www.dreamcricket.com has everything on Cricket under its roof. In fact, http://www.dreamcricket.com is a major promoter of Cricket in the American continent.

Dreamcricket.com gives you ball-by-ball commentary â€“ for all international matches being played in the world. You feel like you are watching the match live. Also you do not need to refresh the page every now and then to get the latest score. The page refreshes automatically.

Dreamcricket.com pioneered the concept of Fantasy Cricket many many years ago. Fantasy Cricket is a special zone where you get to be a selector, and choose a mixed team for Cricket Matches and score points.

http://www.dreamcricket.com also has an online Cricket store known as Pavilion Shop. Presently, only people from the USa can buy Cricket Goods from the Pavilion Shop.

http://www.dreamcricket.com loads very fast when you compare it with other Cricket websites. http://www.dreamcricket.com was founded in the USA. http://www.dreamcricket.com ‘s major audience is in the USA.You would find most bizarre facts about cricket.

There are regular columns by people like Sunil Gavaskar, Suresh Menon etc., There are so many features in http://www.dreamcricket.com like Doosara, Full Toss etc., http://www.dreamcricket.com also has RSS Feeds. If you subscribe to RSS Feeds on http://www.dreamcricket.com you can get Live Cricket scores in your inbox.

http://www.dreamcricket.com helps Die-hard Cricket fans keep in touch with the latest even though they have work in office. They can watch the game, know the scores, curse the batsmen for getting out cheaply, shout at the fielder dropping catches etc.,
